Rentivo | https://www.rentivo.com | REMOTE (Europe/East-europe prefered due to time zones)

We are a small UK based tech team looking to hire a remote full stack developer with strengths which focus on fronted development to create our new Angular2 application for a new project we are launching for our Vacation Rental marketing platform.

You will have a lot of flexibility and autonomy to work on projects based on specs that we supply.

Your front end knowledge should include: Angular2, TypeScript, Google material-design. (Angular2 essential, although choices you make after that are up to you).

If you are interested please email join@rentivo.com and I'll be happy to have a chat and discuss.
